Function Documentation

BOOL FindDevices ( TDeviceInfo *  DeviceList,
int *  DeviceCount,
int  MaxCount,
TUpdateStatusEvent  UpdateStatusProc 
)

Discover all connected BioRadio 150 Base Stations, and return a list including info about those found, (currently just the port name (ex., 'COM3') to which the base station is connected.)

Parameters:
DeviceList array to populate with DeviceInfo structures
DeviceCount number of devices found
MaxCount cardinality of DeviceList array (the maximum number of devices for which to search)
UpdateStatusProc reference to callback procedure used to deliver information on ongoing status
Returns:
error-free execution

BOOL FindDevicesSimple ( char *  DevicePortNameList[],
int *  DeviceCount,
int  MaxDeviceCount,
int  PortNameStrLen 
)

Discover all connected BioRadio 150 Base Stations, and return a list including port names for those found. A simpler version than FindDevices; not requiring custom data structure or callback status function.

Parameters:
DevicePortNameList array of char string pointers, allocated to be populated with port names of found devices
DeviceCount number of devices found
MaxDeviceCount cardinality of DevicePortNameList array (the maximum number of devices for which to search)
PortNameStrLen cardinality of the char strings allocated and pointed to by the DevicePortNameList array (10 suggested)
Returns:
success: device(s) found (1) or failure (0)

int SetDebugging ( DWORD  BioRadio150,
char  value = true 
)

Turn on logging of various data to debug files.

Parameters:
BioRadio150 object handle
value set debugging On (1) or Off (0)
Returns:
success (1) or no device object at handle (-1)
